original_text: Perhaps somebody does not know that they are not obeying one of my rules. When that happens, they must sacrifice a young bull as a burnt offering. The smell of the smoke from this sacrifice will please the Lord. Also, they must give a grain offering, a drink offering and a male goat as a sin offering.
korean_text: 회중이 부지중에 범죄하였거든 온 회중은 수송아지 한 마리를 여호와께 향기로운 화제로 드리고 규례대로 소제와 전제를 드리고 숫염소 한 마리를 속죄제로 드릴 것이라

sentences.original_text: that they are not obeying one of my rules
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 나의 규칙 중 하나를 순종하지 않고 있다는 것을

sentences.original_text: they must sacrifice a young bull
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 어린 수소를 제물로 바쳐야 한다

sentences.original_text: The smell of the smoke from this sacrifice
Also, they must give a grain offering
and a male goat as a sin offering
